code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt describes moderate abdominal pain and Stomach. he is a m illustrator aged 52 ys. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 187 cm, Weight 63.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:52 yo white male illustrator presents with 15 months history of moderate abdominal pain. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 66.7 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment).

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:a 53 year old white male illustrator presents with moderate abdominal pain for past 12 days. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 67 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
